metadata.description: An individual control point in a Parameter Curve

sections.title: What is a Parameter Curve Point
sections.text: A curve can contain many points, and if you step back, you can see all the points together look like a curve. At a high point, the modulated value is high. At a low point, the modulated value is low

sections.title: Time
sections.text: Time in a Parameter Curve Point is relative to the start time of the parent Parameter Curve

sections.title: Value
sections.text: Dependant on the type of the parent Parameter Curve, the Value can be between -1 to +1
